SpecTranslations.ShelterCurseRemovalScroll.label: 除咒卷軸
SpecTranslations.ShelterCurseRemovalScroll.description: 一張能讓你移除所選物品詛咒的卷軸。
SpecTranslations.ShelterHealthPotion.label: 生命藥水
SpecTranslations.ShelterHealthPotion.description: 一瓶能恢復生命值的藥水。
SpecTranslations.ShelterIdentificationScroll.label: 鑑定卷軸
SpecTranslations.ShelterIdentificationScroll.description: 一張能讓你鑑定所選物品的卷軸。
